snippet: As clashes between protesters and the security forces escalated in Cairo on Friday night, bloggers and journalists uploaded video, images and text updates from the scene.
abstract: As clashes between protesters and the security forces escalated in Cairo on Friday night, bloggers and journalists uploaded video, images and text updates from the scene.

byline.original: By LIAM STACK and ROBERT MACKEY

headline.main: Video and Images of New Clashes in Cairo
